LandingPage.title: Club Deportivo Latino
LandingPage.description: An amateur football club in Berlin fully dedicated to the Latin American community.
LandingPage.heroTitle: The largest Latinamerican club in Germany
LandingPage.heroText: 30 years of history and passion for football.
LandingPage.aboutTitle: It’s not just football, it’s community
LandingPage.aboutText: At Club Deportivo Latino, we believe in the power of sport to bring people together and build bridges between cultures. Our club is not only about competition, but about creating a welcoming space where everyone feels valued. Every pass, every goal, and every celebration is an opportunity to strengthen our community and promote inclusion.
LandingPage.missionText: Club Deportivo Latino Berlin is a non-profit sports association created to promote physical activity among Spanish-speaking and Latin American migrants as a tool to foster sportsmanship, solidarity, and social and cultural integration.
LandingPage.goalsText: Our goal is to promote integration and solidarity among Spanish-speaking and Latin American migrants through sport, creating a space where everyone feels part of an active and committed community.
LandingPage.ctaText: Become part of our club and experience Latin football in Berlin.
LandingPage.teamsText: The players who proudly represent us on the field
LandingPage.fundraisingText: With your support, we can continue to grow and offer more opportunities for our community. Every contribution counts!
LandingPage.instafeedText: Stay up to date with our activities and events through Instagram.
LandingPage.contactText: Do you have questions or want to join us? Get in touch through the form.

Footer.footerSlogan: 30 years promoting football and Latin American culture in Berlin.
